text:
Alfred Kolleritsch (16 February 1931 – 29 May 2020) was an Austrian journalist, poet and philosopher. He was born in Eichfeld, Austria. He was the founder of the literary magazine "manuscripts". He was the President of the Forum Stadtpark, a cultural center in Graz.
Kolleritsch died on 29 May 2020 in Graz, aged 89.
